subject: Re: New file uploaded to junit
msgSnippet: My regrets.  First, my email is kevin at grogdog dot com, not whatever yahoo groups puts in here.  Second, this file WAS still in the Files area, it s just
messageBody:
My regrets. First, my email is kevin at grogdog dot com, not whatever
yahoo groups puts in here. Second, this file WAS still in the Files
area, it's just that it's in a subtree called src. I'll remove my
superfluous new copy.

By the way, the original question had to do with running in random
order *multiple times*. To do that (say five times):

return new RepeatedTest(new RandomTestSuite(suite), 5);

K

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> Hello,
>
> This email message is a notification to let you know that
> a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the junit
> group.
>

> Uploaded by : b9n <kevinb@m...>
> Description : Run your tests in random order
>
> You can access this file at the URL
>
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/RandomTestSuite.java
>
> To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit

> http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files
>
> Regards,
>
> b9n <kevinb@m...>
